revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=3Com |model=3CRWER100-75 |upc=662705500089 |asin=B000FCEMC0 |fcc_date=03/16/2006 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTA-151G |manuf_rev=V01 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=O9C-WL537 |ic_id=2299L-WL537 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2315A |cpu1_cspeed=180 |cpu2_cspeed=4 |fla1=4 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Nanya |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2315A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=metal case |stock_boot=RedBoot |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=3Com |default_ssid_regex=^3Com$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1A:C1 |oui_eth=00:1A:C1 }} '''OfficeConnect''' ''Wireless 54Mbps 11g Cable/DSL Router''
"WRTA-151G_V01" and "ENG-d06-0601R RoHS" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device appears to be identical (besides the switch to AR2316A for '''SuperG''') to the [[3Com 3CRWER200-75|3CRWER200-75]].
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual.
The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''3Com''' branded '''DVE''' DSA-0151A-12 A w/ '''3Com''' model 3C16760(7900-000-080) (100-120VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.4A -> 12VDC, 1.25A). <!-- {{WDTOC|embedded}} --> ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing DD-WRT=== <s>[[dd-wrt-wiki:Supported_Devices#3com|Supported]]</s>, was on the supported list at one time.
Quit difficult to enable redboot on Ethernet connection!
Supported by dd-wrt as of = WIP - 3CRWER100 v.24 pre sp2 - build ?
